VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Arts?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Arts is arc {Health Sciences}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Natural Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Natural Sciences is arc {Health Sciences}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Natural Sciences} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Health Sciences} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Health Sciences and Engineering is {335}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Engineering and Natural Sciences in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Engineering and Natural Sciences is {81}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Natural Sciences?
SC.A: The total flow output from Natural Sciences is {596}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 394? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {453} from {Health Sciences} to {Arts}, a flow of {515} from {Natural Sciences} to {Health Sciences}, a flow of {477} from {Health Sciences} to {Natural Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 248? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {81} from {Natural Sciences} to {Engineering}, a flow of {167} from {Engineering} to {Natural Sciences}, a flow of {175} from {Health Sciences} to {Engineering}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 248 and 394? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {321} from {Arts} to {Health Sciences}, a flow of {335} from {Engineering} to {Health Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Arts to Health Sciences or from Engineering to Health Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Engineering} to {Health Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Arts to Health Sciences, from Natural Sciences to Health Sciences, or from Health Sciences to Arts?
NC.A: The flow from {Natural Sciences} to {Health Sciences} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Engineering}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Health Sciences} and {Natural Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Engineering, Arc Health Sciences, Arc Natural Sciences, Arc Arts}.
